mapper.select: select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.password, t.real_name, t.mobile, t.status from sys_user t where t.user_name = #{user_name}
select t.user_id, t.user_name, t.password, t.real_name, t.mobile, t.status, t.create_date from sys_user t where t.status = 2 order by t.create_date desc
mapper.update: update sys_user t set password = #{password} where t.user_id = #{user_id}
